verses.text: Tzalajocab' masanil lum lum tik yet' masanil chonhab' t'a stitac ha' mar, yujto a Jehová Rey toni.
Oyanoch k'ik'al asun t'a spatic yichanh. Te tek'an yaj yopisio yujto tojol syutej sch'olb'itani.
Van sb'at jun k'ak' t'a yichanh, ol tz'ab'at eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ay.
Sakb'i yol yib'anhk’inal tik yuj k'ak' tzek' copnaj yuj, tz'ib'xi lum lum a tz'eq'ui.
Tz'ulaxb'at lum nivac vitz icha nok' chaq'uib' t'a yichanh Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
Ha satcha’anh sch'oxanel stojolal, haxo eb' chonhab', syil stziquiquial eb'.
Ol q'uixvoccan eb' syaq'uem sb'ha t'a juntzanh comon dios, eb' syik'chaanh sb'a yet' juntzanh yechel chi', yujto masanil juntzanh dios chi' ol yaq'uem sb'ha t'a yichanh Jehová.
Mamin Jehová, a yab'ixal tas ix utej ak'an syaelal eb' ajk'ool, ol yab' eb' aj Sion yet' juntzanhxo chonhab' t'a yol yic Judá, yuj chi' ol tzalaj eb'.
Mamin Jehová, Yajal ach t'a yib'anh masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik. Ek'al ach t'a yib'anh masanil comon dios.
Ha ex mach ex tze xajanej Jehová, chaquec el chukal. Yujto a eb' sk'anab'ajani, tanhvab'il eb' yuj. Scolji eb' yuj t'a yol sk'ab' eb' sk'ulan chukal.
Tz'ak'ji sakil k'inal t'a eb' anima wach' spensar yuj, syak'an tzalajk'olal t'a eb' tojol sb'eyb'al.
E masanil ex anima to wach' e pensar, tzalajanhec yuj tas wach' ix sk'ulej Jehová. Alec wach' lolonel t'ay.
